Detailed Description

cvmx_cpri::_map_tbl_config

This register stores two possible K values that can be used for mapping AxCs. The K parameter specifies the number of basic frames spanned by an AxC container block.

The AxC mapping selects between using [K0] or [K1] using the CPRI()_MAP_K_SELECT_RX and CPRI()_MAP_K_SELECT_TX register.
